data.trans: Tin tưởng điều gì đó tồn tại
data.trans_hint: Tôi tin rằng Chúa trời có tồn tại.
data.content_game_1: I believe in God.
data.answer_en_hint: I believe in God.

data.trans: Phải dùng đến (cái gì như một giải pháp cuối cùng)
data.trans_hint: Nếu các cuộc đàm phán thất bại, chúng tôi sẽ phải dùng đến biện pháp đình công.
data.en_hint: If negotiations fail, we shall have to resort to strike action.
data.content_game_1: If negotiations fail, we shall have to resort to strike action.
data.answer_en_hint: If negotiations fail, we shall have to resort to strike action.

data.trans_hint: Ứng cử viên này đang cố gắng hết sức để che đậy vụ bê bối trốn thuế của anh ta.
data.en_hint: The candidate is doing his best to cover up her tax evasion scandal.
data.content_game_1: The candidate is doing his best to cover up her tax evasion scandal.
data.answer_en_hint: The candidate is doing his best to cover up her tax evasion scandal.

data.trans_hint: Theo tôi, vụ bê bối đã đặt dấu chấm hết cho sự nghiệp chính trị gia của cô ta.
data.en_hint: For my money, the scandal has put an end on her career as a politician.
data.content_game_1: For my money, the scandal has put an end on her career as a politician.
data.answer_en_hint: For my money, the scandal has put an end on her career as a politician.

data.trans: Được biểu dương trên báo chí, TV,...
data.trans_hint: Buổi từ thiện của anh ấy đã được biểu dương trên TV.
data.en_hint: His charity event got a good press on TV.
data.content_game_1: His charity event got a good press on TV.
data.answer_en_hint: His charity event got a good press on TV.

data.trans_hint: Bố tôi không thích dành thời gian cho chính trị gia. Ông ấy nói rằng đó là một sự lãng phí thời gian.
data.en_hint: My father has no time for politics. He said it is a waste of time.
data.content_game_1: My father has no time for politics. He said it is a waste of time.
data.answer_en_hint: My father has no time for politics. He said it is a waste of time.

data.trans_hint: Đảng Bảo thủ hiện đang là Đảng đối lập sau tám năm cầm quyền.
data.en_hint: The Conservative party is now in opposition after eight years in power.
data.content_game_1: The Conservative party is now in opposition after eight years in power.
data.answer_en_hint: The Conservative party is now in opposition after eight years in power.

data.trans_hint: Chính phủ mới đã cầm quyền được hai năm rồi, nhưng chẳng có gì thay đổi cả.
data.en_hint: The new government has been in power for two years now, but nothing has changed.
data.content_game_1: The new government has been in power for two years now, but nothing has changed.
data.answer_en_hint: The new government has been in power for two years now, but nothing has changed.

data.trans_hint: Theo tôi, anh ta chỉ toàn nói nhảm.
data.en_hint: For my money, he just talked nonsense.
data.content_game_1: For my money, he just talked nonsense.
data.answer_en_hint: For my money, he just talked nonsense.

data.trans_hint: Bạn không thể nổi điên với anh ấy được bởi vì anh ta đang làm theo chỉ thị của cấp trên.
data.en_hint: You can't be mad at him because he was just toeing the party line.
data.content_game_1: You can't be mad at him because he was just toeing the party line.
data.answer_en_hint: You can't be mad at him because he was just toeing the party line.

data.trans_hint: Cả hai bên đang cố gắng hết sức để chiến thắng những lá phiếu cuối cùng.
data.en_hint: Both parties are trying their utmost to win the last votes
data.content_game_1: Both parties are trying their utmost to win the last votes
data.answer_en_hint: Both parties are trying their utmost to win the last votes

data.trans: Có được những gì mà chúng ta xứng đáng có
data.trans_hint: Tôi không ngạc nhiên lắm vào kết quả này. Theo tôi, chúng ta có được những gì mà chúng ta xứng đáng có.
data.en_hint: I'm not very surprised at the result. In my opinion, we get what we deserve.
data.content_game_1: I'm not very surprised at the result. In my opinion, we get what we deserve.
data.answer_en_hint: I'm not very surprised at the result. In my opinion, we get what we deserve.
